rukus.text: 39|53|(Sihamtaka) jana'i diya, ‘he mora bandasakala! Tomalokara yisakale nijara oparata an'yaya karaicha, allahara anugrahara paraa niraasa naha’ba, niscaya allahe sakalo papa ksama karai diba. Niscaya te'om parama ksamasila, parama dayalu’.
39|54|Arau tomaloke nija pratipalakara abhimukhi horaa arau tomalokara oparata sasti ahara agate'i tomaloke te'omra ocarata atmasamarpana karaa, iyara pichata kintu tomalokaka sahaya karaa naha’ba.

39|55|Arau tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa tomalokara prati yi uttama (puthi) aratirna karaa haiche, seye tomalokara oparata atarkitabharae sasti ahara purbe'i tomaloke tara anusarana karaa, an'yatha (se'i sasti enekai ahiba ye) tomaloke upalabdhi'o karaiba noraaraiba.
39|56|Pichata yate konorae'i kabalagiya nahaya ye, ‘haya mora durbhagya! Allahara prati thaka mora kartabyata ma'i arahela karaichilo! Arau ma'i upahasakarai bilakara antarbhukta achilo’.
39|57|Athaba enekaiyo yate kabalagiya nahaya, ‘haya! Allahe yadi moka hidayata karailehemtena tente niscaya ma'i muttakbisakalara antarbhukta ha’lohemtena!’
39|58|Athaba sasti dekhi'o yate konoba'i kabalagiya nahaya, ‘haya! Yadi ma'i ebara ubhati yaba parailohemtena tente ma'i satkarmasilasakalara antarbhukta ha’lohemtena!’
39|59|Haya, arasye tomara ocarata mora nidarsana ahichila, kintu tumi se'iboraka asbikara karaichila arau ahankara karaichila; arau tumi achila kaphira bilakara antarbhukta.
39|60|Arau yisakale allahara prati micha araopa karae, tumi kiyamatara dina dekhiba sihamtara mukha ka’la paraiche. Ahankarai bilakara abasasthala jahannama nahayane barau
39|61|arau yisakale takbaraa aralambana karaiche, allahe te'omlokaka saphalatasaha ud'dhara karaiba, te'omlokaka kono amangale sparsa nakaraiba arau te'omloka cintita'o naha’ba.
39|62|Allahe'i sakalo bastura srasta arau teraemi sakalo bastura tattbaradhayaka.
39|63|Akasasamuha arau prthiraira cabisamuha te'omra ocarate'i. Arau yisakale allahara ayatasamuhaka asbikara karae sihamte'i ksatigrasta.
